    3. Sparse Reward Propagation for Deep Reinforcement Learning

    Link

    https://github.com/Vamsi995/Reward-Propagation

    Role

    Team Lead

    Responsibilities

    Technology Frameworks & Languages

    Python, PyTorch

    Sparse Reward Propagation for Deep Reinforcement Learning

    On this page

    This work is based on the paper Reward Propagation using Graph Convolutional Networks using the Proto Value Functions by Mahadevan and Maggioni as features to the GCN. The underlying MDP of the Gridworld is captured as a graph which is then used to calculate the Proto Value Functions. The implementation is GCN is baseed on Thomas Kipfâ€™s pytorch GCN implementation. The environment currently is only a GridWorld and all the results have been produced using this environment. The actor critic network implementation was not from any library but our own implementation using linear function approximators.

    The full report can be viewed here: Sparse Reward Propagation Report

    Updated: November 3, 2023
